name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in high-performance web applications. Proficient in **React**, **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **Redux**, **Express**, **REST**, **GraphQL**, **Python**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Mongo**. Skilled in implementing modern front-end and back-end technologies to create seamless web experiences while ensuring optimal performance, security, and compliance with standards like PCI DSS.
Demonstrated expertise in cloud solutions including **AWS** with strong capabilities in CI/CD automation to enhance deployment efficiency. Passionate about leveraging analytics and automation tools for continuous improvement and performance tuning using **Lighthouse** and **Axe** for enhanced user experiences. Committed to building robust applications through deep knowledge of microservices architecture, web security practices, and best coding standards. Experience in leading cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and deliver innovative solutions across various industries.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and maintained robust applications utilizing **React** (17-18), **Node.js**, and **TypeScript**, ensuring high performance and adherence to coding standards.
- Integrated state management seamlessly through **Redux** and **Hooks**, optimizing user interactions and data flow.
- Architected back-end services using **Express**, with rich APIs built on **REST** and **GraphQL** for efficient data handling and queries.
- Designed data storage solutions leveraging **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, allowing for efficient data management in line with industry best practices.
- Implemented CI/CD processes to automate deployments and ensure continuous integration, enhancing development agility and code quality.
- Prioritized application security, applying measures that comply with regulatory standards, ensuring safe data handling for both healthcare and financial domains.
- Configured cloud services on **AWS** for scalable deployment strategies, achieving fault tolerance and high availability.
- Developed responsive user interfaces using **HTML** and **CSS**, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and mobile-first strategies.
- Employed performance optimization techniques and tools, such as **Lighthouse** for front-end auditing and enhancing application speed.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **Firebase** for real-time capabilities, enhancing user engagement and experience.
- Led initiatives to implement automated testing frameworks such as Jest and Cypress, achieving over **90% code coverage** across applications, ensuring reliability.
- Established security protocols for sensitive data handling and application integrity, addressing vulnerabilities through thorough assessments.
- Authored extensive documentation for codebases and APIs to facilitate team collaboration and onboarding, resulting in a **30% reduction** in onboarding time.
- Integrated various third-party APIs to enhance application features and user experiences, facilitating direct access to essential data and services.

• Utilized **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to lead the development and modernization of financial platforms, incorporating a microservices-based architecture that enhanced scalability, maintainability, and throughput for high-volume transaction systems.
• Developed dynamic, user-focused front-end applications leveraging **React** (18), **TypeScript**, and **Redux**, integrating **Tailwind CSS** for responsive design, crucial for financial dashboards and admin portals.
• Constructed real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards employing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI** Embedded, empowering operations teams to effectively track financial activity and detect anomalies, achieving a **30% increase** in actionable insights generated.
• Established a robust event-driven architecture by integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, facilitating asynchronous communication and real-time event processing for transactions, alerts, and compliance workflows.
• Built and orchestrated ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling efficient batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from both internal and third-party sources.
• Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction patterns to proactively identify and flag suspicious activities, reducing fraud incidents by **25%**.
• Created ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference directly into backend services to support real-time decision-making.
• Ensured application performance and security by conducting regular audits with **Lighthouse** and **Axe**, driving improvements in system responsiveness and security measures.

• Developed scalable and high-performance web applications using **React (18)**, **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**, and **TypeScript**, ensuring optimal user experience through responsive design and efficient state management with **Redux** and **Hooks**.
• Implemented RESTful and GraphQL APIs, fostering a seamless connection between frontend and backend services while adhering to industry best practices for **security** and **performance**.
• Engineered robust backend services with **Python** frameworks (FastAPI, Django) to support vital e-commerce functionalities, achieving a high availability rate of **99.9%** and minimal latency across features.
• Leveraged **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** for efficient data storage, employing advanced query optimization techniques to handle **1000+** concurrent database operations smoothly.
• Integrated CI/CD pipelines to automate deployment processes, reducing release cycles by **30%** and ensuring continuous integration stability.
• Conducted performance audits using **Lighthouse** and **Axe**, identifying bottlenecks and applying enhancements that improved load times by up to **40%**.
• Applied **AWS** services for cloud infrastructure management, optimizing costs and improving data redundancy and availability while managing a portfolio of over **500,000+** user records securely.
• Employed secure coding practices with an emphasis on GDPR compliance and implemented role-based access control (RBAC) using **OAuth 2.0** for enhanced user data protection.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and deliver web solutions in line with business objectives, achieving an increase in user engagement metrics by **25%**.
